page.title: 06MELDRUM HOTEL,CERES
page.content: The{Meldrum Hotel}in{Ceres was probably built in the{17th {century}and has{5 bedrooms}and{2 {bars.}The{kitchen}has a{large cooker, {large freezer}and{toastmakers.}The owner bought the hotel over 4 years ago.In that time she has made lots of modern improvements and has spent about 50% of the cost doing modernisations.Here is a sample menu:- {Soup of the day-75p:Breaded {scampi-Â£4.25p:T Bone {steak-Â£7.85p:Atlantic prawn {salad-Â£4.00:Home made apple pie-Â£1.00: {Coffee and mints_65p.}The{wines}are from{France,Portugal,Germany and {Italy.}The most expensive is{champagne at Â£17.50.
